issue.title: [R] gcc-UBSAN failure on CRAN
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9575](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9575). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://www.stats.ox.ac.uk/pub/bdr/memtests/gcc-UBSAN/arrow/tests/testthat.Rout shows 

